attributes.action: stop giving preferential treatment to immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Immigrants should not be allowed into this country unless they can prove that they have a legitimate job, housing and are financially secure.  Immigrants should not be allowed to come to this country and immediately claim countless benefits - no benefits should be allowed to immigrants unless they have contributed NIC and Tax like all other citizens.  They should not be given priority housing from local councils and authority's - they should wiat on a waiting list for years like the rest of us!  Translators should not be provided for them or their children - if you want to live in the UK, being able to speak english is essential.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
